column1: We saw your story on the news, and we were so sorry to hear about your loss.
A and we realized... The man that murdered your son must be the same person that killed our daughter!
It's so very hard to lose a loved one, isn't it?

Hello, Gary. Great to see you. Chris and Linda, this is our good friend, Congressman Gary Condit.  He also lost someone close to him and thinks it something to do with the same Puerto Rican guy that hurt our kids.
So you see, Chris and Linda, there are people like you all over the country who've been affected by Some Puerto Rican Guy.
